languages.text: "Есть немного. Родился в брюхе чартистского судна, из клана кормчих. Лет до пятнадцати учился на семейное ремесло, а тут как бунт случится — все мое семейство и повырезали, мрази нижнетрюмные. Молодняк оставили — еще бы, детишки с вживленными разъемами, из таких навигационных сервиторов только и делать. Только хрен им, а не сервитора из меня лепить — деру дал, залез в переборки и потом месяцами, одного за другим..." {n}Равор осекается.{/n} "Разболтался я что-то. В общем, да, из пустотнорожденных".

"That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."
languages.original_text: "Есть немного. Родился в брюхе чартистского судна, из клана кормчих. Лет до пятнадцати учился на семейное ремесло, а тут как бунт случится — все мое семейство и повырезали, мрази нижнетрюмные. Молодняк оставили — еще бы, детишки с вживленными разъемами, из таких навигационных сервиторов только и делать. Только хрен им, а не сервитора из меня лепить — деру дал, залез в переборки и потом месяцами, одного за другим..." {n}Равор осекается.{/n} "Разболтался я что-то. В общем, да, из пустотнорожденных".

traits.locale_text: "That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire kin was butchered in a mutiny by the lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, children with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. I wouldn't have it that way, though, so I fled into the rafters and spent months stalking them, one after the other..." {n}Ravor falters.{/n} "You got me talking. Anyway, yes, I am a voidborn."

"That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire kin was butchered in a mutiny by the lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, children with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. I wouldn't have it that way, though, so I fled into the rafters and spent months stalking them, one after the other..." {n}Ravor falters.{/n} "You got me talking. Anyway, yes, I am a voidborn."

I wouldn't have it that way, though, so I fled into the rafters and spent months stalking them, one after the other..." {n}Ravor falters.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I am a voidborn."

They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, children with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. Anyway, yes, I am a voidborn."

"That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."

"That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."

languages.text: “没错，我是舵手氏族的成员，出生在某个宪章船长的船上。我一直都在学习家族贸易，可在我十五岁那年，底层的那群人渣造反了，我所有的家人都被杀光了。他们放过了年轻人，是啊，因为有植入物的孩子可以改造成挺不错的导航机仆。但我可不打算变成机仆，他们别想把我变成那种东西，于是我就逃进了通风管道。在接下来的几个月里，我把那群王八蛋一个接一个地弄死了——”{n}雷沃突然停了下来。{/n}“我和你叨叨得太多了。总之，没错，我确实是个虚空之子。”
languages.original_text: "That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."

traits.locale_text: “没错，我是舵手氏族的成员，出生在某个宪章船长的船上。我一直都在学习家族贸易，可在我十五岁那年，底层的那群人渣造反了，我所有的家人都被杀光了。他们放过了年轻人，是啊，因为有植入物的孩子可以改造成挺不错的导航奴工。但我可不打算变成奴工，他们别想把我变成那种东西，于是我就逃进了通风管道。在接下来的几个月里，我把那群王八蛋一个接一个地弄死了——”{n}雷沃突然停了下来。{/n}“我和你叨叨得太多了。总之，没错，我确实是个虚空之子。”

languages.text: «Así es. Nací en un clan de timoneles en las entrañas de una nave Cartista. Estudié el negocio familiar hasta los quince años, cuando mi clan entero fue masacrado en un motín liderado por la escoria de las cubiertas inferiores. Perdonaron la vida a los más pequeños, claro, porque los niños con conectores implantados son excelentes servidores de navegación. Pero no iba a dejar que me pasara: yo no iba a ser servidor, así que escapé por los pasadizos. Pasé varios meses matándolos de uno en uno...». {n}Ravor se detiene bruscamente.{/n} «Perdón, le estaba contando toda mi vida. Sí, soy nacido en el vacío».
languages.original_text: "That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Nací en un clan de timoneles en las entrañas de una nave Cartista. Estudié el negocio familiar hasta los quince años, cuando mi clan entero fue masacrado en un motín liderado por la escoria de las cubiertas inferiores. Perdonaron la vida a los más pequeños, claro, porque los niños con conectores implantados son excelentes servidores de navegación. Pero no iba a dejar que me pasara: yo no iba a ser servidor, así que escapé por los pasadizos. Pasé varios meses matándolos de uno en uno...».{n}Ravor se detiene bruscamente.{/n} «Perdón, le estaba contando toda mi vida. Sí, soy nacido en el vacío».

languages.text: 「その通りです。私は、チャーティストの船の船底で、操舵手の一族として生を受けました。15歳まで家業を学びましたが、下層階級の反乱で一族すべてを虐殺されました。若者たちは見逃されましたが――もちろん、その者たちには、立派なサーヴィターとなるコネクターを埋め込まれてはいました。ですが、私にはその施術は施されませんでした――彼らは私をサーヴィターにするつもりはなかったのです。そうして、私は逃げおおせました。それから何ヶ月もかけて、私は彼らを次々と…」{n}ラヴォアは突然話を止めた。{/n}「つい話しすぎましたね。ええ、私は虚空生まれです」
languages.original_text: "That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりです。私は、チャーティストの船の船底で、操舵手の一族として生を受けました。15歳まで家業を学びましたが、下層階級の反乱で一族全員を虐殺されました。彼らは若者を見逃したました。もちろん、その若者たちは、立派なサーヴィターとなるコネクターを埋め込まれては真下が。ですが、私にはその施術は施されていませんでした。彼らは私をサービターにするつもりはなかったのです。そうして、、私は逃げおおせました。それから何ヶ月もかけて、私は彼らを次々と…」{n}ラヴォアは突然話を止めた。{/n}「つい話しすぎましたね。ええ、私は虚空生まれです」

languages.text: "Das bin ich. Geboren wurde ich auf einem Freihandelsschiff als Sohn eines Clans von Steuermännern. Hab das Handwerk meiner Familie gelernt, bis ich fünfzehn war, dann wurde mein Clan während einer Meuterei von Gesocks aus dem unteren Frachtraum abgeschlachtet. Die Jungen unter uns haben sie verschont ... natürlich ... Kinder mit implantierten Konnektoren geben großartige Navigationsservitoren ab. Aber ich hatte keine ... sie hätten also nie einen Servitor aus mir gemacht ... also bin ich in die Kriechgänge geflohen. Und dann hab ich Monate damit verbracht sie zu töten ... einen nach dem anderen ..." {n}Ravor hält abrupt inne.{/n} "Aber ich rede zu viel. Jedenfalls bin ich ein Kind der Leere, ja."
languages.original_text: "That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."

traits.locale_text: "Das bin ich. Geboren wurde ich auf einem Freihandelsschiff als Sohn eines Clans von Steuermännern. Hab das Handwerk meiner Familie gelernt, bis ich fünfzehn war, dann wurde mein Clan während einer Meuterei von Gesocks aus dem unteren Frachtraum abgeschlachtet. Die Jungen unter uns haben sie verschont ... natürlich ... Kinder mit implantierten Konnektoren geben großartige Navigationsservitoren ab. Aber ich hatte keine ... sie hätten also nie einen Servitor aus mir gemacht ... also bin ich in die Kriechgänge geflohen. Und dann hab ich Monate damit verbracht sie zu töten ... einen nach dem anderen ..." {n}Ravor hält abrupt inne.{/n} "Aber ich rede zu viel. Jedenfalls bin ich ein Kind der Leere, ja."

languages.text: « En effet. Je suis né au sein d'un clan de timoniers dans les entrailles d'un vaisseau des Cartographes. J'ai appris le métier familial jusqu'à mes quinze ans, quand mon clan a été massacré par une mutinerie fomentée par la vermine des ponts inférieurs. Ils ont évidemment épargné les plus jeunes... Des gamins implantés avec des connecteurs font d'excellents servitors de navigation. Mais je ne me suis pas laissé faire... Pas question de finir comme un servitor... Alors, je me suis réfugié dans les gaines techniques et j'ai passé les mois suivants à les liquider un à un... » {n}Ravor s'interrompt brusquement.{/n} « Vous m'avez amené à vider mon sac, seigneur-cap'taine. J'espère que cela répond à votre question. Ouais, je suis un hors-monde. »
languages.original_text: "That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Je suis né au sein d'un clan de timoniers dans les entrailles d'un vaisseau des Cartographes. J'ai appris le métier familial jusqu'à mes quinze ans, quand mon clan a été massacré par une mutinerie fomentée par la vermine des ponts inférieurs. Ils ont évidemment épargné les plus jeunes... Des gamins implantés avec des connecteurs font d'excellents servitors de navigation. Mais je ne me suis pas laissé faire... Pas question de finir comme un servitor... Alors, je me suis réfugié dans les gaines techniques et j'ai passé les mois suivants à les liquider un à un... » {n}Ravor s'interrompt brusquement.{/n} « Vous m'avez amené à vider mon sac, seigneur-cap'taine. J'espère que cela répond à votre question. Ouais, je suis un hors-monde. »

languages.text: "Öyleyim ya. Haritacı gemisinin böğründe, bir serdümen klanının eline doğdum. On beş yaşına dek aile mesleğimizi öğrendim. Sonra alt ambar sıçanlarının çıkardığı bir isyanda tüm klanım katledildi. Gençlerin canını bağışladılar. Tabii ki bağışlayacaklardı. Bağlayıcı implantlı çocuklardan on numara rota hizmetörü çıkar. Çıkmasına çıkar da ben kaldıramazdım. Beni hizmetör yapamazlar dedim, bir delik bulup kaçtım. Ardından da şerefsizlerin alayını hakladım. Aylarca, teker teker." {n}Ravor ansızın susuyor.{/n} "Sayenizde çenem düştü. Neyse işte, evet, uçsuzdoğanlardanım."
languages.original_text: "That I am. Born into a helmsman clan in the bowels of a Chartist vessel. Studied the family trade until I was fifteen, then my entire clan was butchered in a mutiny by lower hold scum. They spared the young 'uns — of course they did, kids with implanted connectors make great navigational servitors. But I was having none of it — they weren't going to make a servitor out of me — so I escaped into the crawlways. And then I spent months picking them off, one after the other—" {n}Ravor stops abruptly.{/n} "You got me talking up a storm. Anyway, yes, I'm a voidborn."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyim ya. İmtiyazlı bir geminin böğüründe, bir serdümen klanının eline doğdum. On beş yaşına dek aile mesleğimizi öğrendim. Sonra alt ambar sıçanlarının çıkardığı bir isyanda tüm klanım katledildi. Gençlerin canını bağışladılar. Tabii ki bağışlayacaklardı. Bağlayıcı implantlı çocuklardan on numara rota servitörü çıkar. Çıkmasına çıkar da ben kaldıramazdım. Beni servitör yapamazlar dedim, bir delik bulup kaçtım. Ardından da şerefsizlerin alayını hakladım. Aylarca, teker teker." {n}Ravor ansızın susuyor.{/n} "Sayenizde çenem düştü. Neyse işte, evet, uçsuzdoğanlardanım."
